description.ko: 부드럽게 넘실거리는 파동과 자연스러운 그라데이션을 통해 살아 숨 쉬는 리듬감을 표현하며, 끊김 없이 이어지는 유기적인 움직임을 시각화합니다.
description.en: A visual representation of seamless movement, featuring soft undulating waves and natural gradients that evoke a sense of living, breathing rhythm.

prompt: AURA-7 aesthetic, organic flow, fluid dynamics, soft undulating curves, liquid motion, ethereal pastel gradients, seamless natural transitions, high resolution, 8k, abstract biological forms, silk-like textures, soft ambient lighting
